cause.description:
At "The Skate, Surf, and Bike Cause" our mission is to get more people active in surfing and skating in our communities.
GET MORE FKN PPL IN THIS CAUSE WHO SKATE/BIKE/SURF
1. Not Enough Skaters Skatin On Streets
2. Not Enough Surfers Surfin At Beaches
3. Not Enough Bikers Bikin Round Town
cause.name: Skate/Surf/Bike
